start_charge.name: Start charge
start_charge.description: Starts the vehicle charging. It must be plugged in first!

vin.name: VIN
vin.description: The vehicle identification number (VIN) of the vehicle, 17 characters.

update.name: Update
update.description: Fetches the last state of the vehicle of all your accounts, requesting an update from of the state from the car if possible.
